title: ‘Suicide’ - Is Prevention Possible?
description: Suicide is one of the most talked about topics in the world today! The number of suicides has increased dramatically in the last 5 years. Do we have anything to do to prevent suicide at all September 10 is celebrated around the world - 'Suicide Prevention Day'. Thirty-six countries have already joined WHO's plan to prevent suicide, coming forward with their own resources. Due to the importance of suicide prevention, the theme of this year's World Mental Health Day has been determined to be suicide.

title: Mental Health And Mental Health Issues
description: Mental health well-being incorporates our enthusiastic, mental, and social prosperity. It influences how we think, feel, and act. It additionally decides how we handle pressure, identify with others, and settle on decisions. Mental health is significant at each phase of life, from youth and pre-adulthood through adulthood. Through a mind-blowing span, on the off chance that you experience mental health issues, your reasoning, state of mind, and conduct could be influenced. title: Educated housewife 'mother'
description: “I suffer from a whole identity crisis when I first read about a mother's perception of motherhood in a blog. He thinks that his studies, degree-results are all just a waste of time, since he doesn't do anything outside now! She even claims that she could have become a 'mother' long ago without education! Ever since I read this, I have been suffering from anxiety! I spent more than 50,000 on education, even at the age of 23 I had a 6 digit salary job, and now I'm doing nothing! What am I actually doing !? ” Madina Lawlis, a photographer and author from Little Rock, Arkansas, wrote in a blog.
